targets.rawSql: SELECT geo_country as 'Country', count() as 'Total Attacks', countIf(severity = 'CRITICAL') as 'Critical', countIf(severity = 'HIGH') as 'High', round(avg(confidence_score), 2) as 'Avg Confidence' FROM siem.threats WHERE event_time >= now() - INTERVAL 12 HOUR AND geo_country != 'Unknown' GROUP BY geo_country ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 15

SELECT source_ip as 'IP Address', geo_country as 'Country', count() as 'Attacks', group_concat(DISTINCT threat_type) as 'Attack Types', max(confidence_score) as 'Max Confidence' FROM siem.threats WHERE event_time >= now() - INTERVAL 12 HOUR GROUP BY source_ip, geo_country HAVING count() >= 2 ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT geo_country, threat_type, count() as attacks FROM siem.threats WHERE event_time >= now() - INTERVAL 12 HOUR AND geo_country != 'Unknown' GROUP BY geo_country, threat_type ORDER BY attacks DESC

SELECT toStartOfHour(event_time) as time, countIf(severity = 'CRITICAL') as 'Critical', countIf(severity = 'HIGH') as 'High', countIf(severity = 'MEDIUM') as 'Medium', countIf(severity = 'LOW') as 'Low' FROM siem.threats WHERE event_time >= now() - INTERVAL 12 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT round(100 - (uniq(source_ip) * 10), 1) as reputation_score FROM siem.threats WHERE event_time >= now() - INTERVAL 12 HOUR

SELECT geo_country as 'Country', count() as 'Total Threats', uniq(source_ip) as 'Unique IPs', round(count() / uniq(source_ip), 2) as 'Attacks per IP', CASE WHEN count() > 10 THEN 'HIGH' WHEN count() > 5 THEN 'MEDIUM' ELSE 'LOW' END as 'Risk Level' FROM siem.threats WHERE event_time >= now() - INTERVAL 12 HOUR AND geo_country != 'Unknown' GROUP BY geo_country ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 10
